Ragnar opened a commline with Wheeljack.

Ragnar: Jacky, how is the shuttle? Could she fly again?

He was worried about Vlad now, and that was the first time in his
life. Vlad had been the nemesis of his friend and former Khan, Phelan
Kell, since Phelan was taken as a bondsman by the Wolves. When Ragnar
and Phelan went in exile with the warden half of Clan Wolf, Vladimir
stayed behind and became the Khan of the Crusader Wolves.

Now, he just hoped he was still alive. Maybe he was an enemy, but he
was also a fellow Clan Warrior.

Once again, he opened a frequency.

Ragnar: Galaxy Commander, I am waiting for an update on the salvage
operations. How is the planning going?

Katya rubbed the back of her head.

Katya: Hang on, Ragnar. (To Kup) Do you think we could mount that
assault now? From what we know, some Predacons are out in the East...
